name: Gross enrollment rate in junior secondary education
description: Total enrolment in secondary school, regardless of age, expressed as a percentage of the eligible official secondary school-age population (12-17 years of age in Nigeria) in a given school year.

name: Proportion of households with improved sanitation
description: Percentage of people in urban or rural areas, out of the total urban or rural population, who have access to access to improved latrines that are not public or shared by many households.
